ul.li: Sanselan requires Java 1.4 or higher. It could easily be converted to require only 1.2.
The question of porting to J2ME has been raised, but not yet pursued.
Download the latest release from the download page.
Add the jar to your project's classpath.
See our Sample Code for examples.
Have questions? Subscribe to the commons user mailing list.

section.name: Building from the latest Source
section.p:
There are two steps to building Commons Sanselan from the latest source:
Check out the latest source from Subversion
1. mkdir sanselan-snapshot
2. cd sanselan-snapshot
3. svn checkout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/sanselan/trunk/
Build using Maven 2
1. Install the latest version of Maven
2. cd sanselan-snapshot (if you are not already in the project directory)
3. mvn -Prc package
4. The build will be in the "target" folder.
